description: Complete with baked eggs, smoked salmon, cream cheese, avocado and pickled red onion, this impressive yet fuss-free platter is perfect for a weekend brunch.
name: Brunch Platter Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 light rye linseed & quinoa pane di casa loaf, thinly sliced
0.5 small red onion, thinly sliced into rounds
300g Woolworths hot smoked salmon with pepper
1 avocado, halved, deseeded, cut into thin wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Lightly spray 6 holes of a 1/3-cup capacity muffin pan with oil. Crack one egg into each hole. Place bread on a baking tray and spray both sides with oil. Bake eggs and bread for 15 minutes or until bread is toasted and egg whites are set and yolk is cooked to your liking.

Meanwhile, combine onion and vinegar in a small bowl and set aside until required. Finely chop half of the dill, then place in a bowl with cream cheese, capers and lemon juice, then stir to combine. Season with pepper.
Arrange salmon, eggs, avocado, bread, drained onion, cream cheese mixture and lemon wedges on a platter. Season with pepper and serve scattered with remaining dill.
